Name: Leaf
About the game: The jellyfish has ordered you to stabilize the worlds. Leaf is an exploration driven action adventure game that doesn't hold your hand. You're on a quest to stabilize two parallell worlds. On your adventure you stumble across hidden weapons, spells and special items that might help you overcome the odds. Key Features Explore an abandoned world Fight monsters and defeat challenging bosses Seek powerful items and hidden areas Enjoy the beautiful soundtrack Estimated playtime: 3-6 hours.
